questions.quote: Or he's a crime fighter safeguarding his secret identity! Elaine, you could be dating the Green Lantern!
Oh, wait a minute, wait a minute, don't tell me, don't tell me. It starts with a . . . Duncan Meyers. Oh, wow, this is something. I haven't seen you guys in what, twenty years?
Her back went out. She's gotta be there for a couple of days. All she said on the way over in the car was, "Why, George, why?!".. I said, "Because it's there!"
All right, so are you ready, so we'll go out and get something to eat.
I mean, every time I see him, it's Tony this, Tony that. George is like a school girl around him
Oh no. That's impossible. I'd rather lie to him for the rest of my life that go through that again. He was crying. Tears. Accompanied by mucus.
...so I said to him: Arthur, Artie come on, why does the salesman have to die? Change the title; The life of a salesman. That's what people want to see.
The attic? Y-you haven't wore any of those clothes for years.
Hey! Did you hear the bank on the corner is offering a 100 dollars if you go in there and they don't greet you with a hello?
What are you deaf? I said sit down!  Hey, for the last time, sit down.
